markdownRemark.html: A very beautiful and exclusive golf course. It has been hosting the Volvo Master Matchplay championship for several years in a row. This is quite a challenging but excellently maintained golf course. The attention to detail and the service is superb. Even the buggy has GPS! If you are planning a special occasion, this is a must! The rooms are beautiful and the service is great. The higher price is definitely worth it.

frontmatter.address: Crta. de Casares s/n, Casares 29690 Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 290.00 euro,  Highest green fee weekends 290.00 euro
